videos.headline: 2012 NC State Upset: EJ Manuel Sacked

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (2012 NC State Upset: EJ Manuel Sacked) 2014/09/25 ODV

videos.description: Clip from NC State's 17-16 upset win over Florida State.  Dontae Johnson sacks EJ Manuel for a loss of 15 yards.

videos.headline: 2012 NC State Upset: Punt Block

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (2012 NC State Upset: Punt Block) 2014/09/25 ODV

videos.description: Clip from NC State's 17-16 upset win over Florida State.  Late in the fourth quarter, NC State blocks Florida State's punt.

videos.headline: 2012 NC State Upset: 4th and 10 Conversion

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (2012 NC State Upset: 4th and 10 Conversion) 2014/09/25 ODV

videos.description: Clip from NC State's 17-16 upset win over Florida State.  Driving for the winning score late in the fourth quarter, NC State converts a 4th and 10 to keep the drive alive.

videos.headline: 2012 NC State Upset: Go-Ahead Touchdown

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (2012 NC State Upset: Go-Ahead Touchdown) 2014/09/25 ODV

videos.description: Clip from NC State's 17-16 upset win over Florida State.  Bryan Underwood 2yd touchdown reception from Mike Glennon.
